message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it.

I understand you think it's pricey, but I've done some research and I think it's worth more to me than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1050000, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product.

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated, Bob. I've already met you halfway and you're still not budging. I'm willing to compromise again, but I need to think you're getting a fair deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1050000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I understand your frustration, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay that much. I'm willing to pay $925000 for the product.
